ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Document status will be changed to “Cancelled” and document will not appear in the purchase. Do you want to continue ?')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Closed. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction already Canceled. Cannot edit this Transaction.')
MlsTrans('This transaction is already approved. Cannot edit this transaction.')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document in this period')
MlsTrans('This transaction already closed. Cannot cancel this transaction')
MlsTrans('Cannot cancel document within approval process')
MlsTrans('Cannot edit document within approval process')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(DocEntry) as [Count], SUM(DocTotal) as [Total] FROM OQUT WHERE DocNum like '%'+':1'+'%' and (DocDate between ':2' and ':3') and (CardName like '%'+':4'+'%') and (DocStatus = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') and (canceled = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') and (DocType = ':7' or ':7' is null or ':7' = '') :10 :8 :9

select Q.DocEntry, Q.DocNum, Q.Handwrtten, Q.Printed, Q.DocStatus, Q.InvntSttus, Q.Transfered, Q.DocType, Q.DocDate, Q.DocDueDate, Q.CardCode, Q.CardName, Q.Address, Q.NumAtCard, Q.VatPercent, Q.VatSum, Q.VatSumFC, Q.DiscPrcnt, Q.DiscSum, Q.DiscSumFC, Q.DocCur, Q.CANCELED, Q.DocRate, Q.DocTotal, Q.DocTotalFC, Q.PaidToDate, Q.U_IDU_PT, Q.UserSign, Q.CreateDate, Q.CreateTS, Q.UserSign2, Q.UpdateDate, Q.UpdateTS, Q.ObjType, Q.WddStatus, P.ListName FROM OQUT Q LEFT JOIN OPLN P ON Q.GrossBase = P.ListNum WHERE DocNum like '%'+':1'+'%' and (DocDate between ':2' and ':3') and (CardName like '%'+':4'+'%') and (DocStatus = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') and (canceled = ':6' or ':6' is null or ':6' = '') and (DocType = ':7' or ':7' is null or ':7' = '') :10 :8 :9 order by docentry desc
